DOC.brief_title: EMBRACE-SC : Observational Study Subcutaneous ( SC ) Tocilizumab Alone Combination With Conventional Disease-Modifying Antirheumatic Drugs ( cDMARDs ) Rheumatoid Arthritis

Participants receive Tocilizumab ( TCZ ) 4 week prior enrolment . Participants receive TCZ past treatment . Participants receive treatment investigational agent within 4 week ( 5 halflives investigational agent , whichever long ) start treatment TCZ SC .
